Item.Name: Full Incense
Item.Description: This holder always goes last in the the initiative order.

Item.Description: Doubles all prize money.

Item.Name: Pure Incense
Item.Description: Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters.

Item.Name: Rock Incense
Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Rock type moves.

Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Water type moves.

Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Water type moves.

Item.Name: Adamant Orb
Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Dragon and Steel type moves when held by Dialga.

Item.Name: Deep Sea Scale
Item.Description: Increases Clamperl's Special Defense by 2.

Item.Name: Deep Sea Tooth
Item.Description: Increases Clamperl's Special by 2.

Item.Name: Gaseous Orb
Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Dragon and Ghost type moves when held by Giratina

Item.Name: Light Ball
Item.Description: Pikachu gains 2 Strength and 2 Special.

Item.Name: Lucky Punch
Item.Description: Increases Chansey's or Blissey's Strength by 2.

Item.Name: Lustrous Orb
Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Dragon and Water type moves when held by Palkia.

Item.Name: Leek
Item.Description: All of Farfetch'd's attacks are now High Criticals.

Item.Name: Metal Powder
Item.Description: Increases Ditto's Defense by 2. Does not work when transformed.

Item.Name: Quick Powder
Item.Description: Increases Ditto's Dexterity by 2. Does not work when transformed.

Item.Name: Soul Dew
Item.Description: Adds 1 damage die to Dragon and Psychic moves when held by Latios/Latias.

Item.Name: Thick Club
Item.Description: Increases Cubone's and Marowak's Strength by 2.

Item.Name: Amulet Coin
Item.Description: Doubles all prize money.

Item.Name: Eviolite
Item.Description: Unevolved Pokemon gain 1 Defense and Special Defense.

Item.Name: Expert Belt
Item.Description: Super effective moves deal 1 additional damage.

Item.Name: Life Orb
Item.Description: All moves deal 2 extra damage but will now have the recoil effect.

Item.Name: King's Rock
Item.Description: All attacks have a chance to flinch (Roll 1 dice)

Item.Name: Lucky Egg
Item.Description: Each victory counts as two victories.

Item.Name: Quick Claw
Item.Description: Gain 2 extra initiative.

Item.Name: Razor Claw
Item.Description: All attacks are now High Criticals.

Item.Name: Razor Fang
Item.Description: All attacks have a chance to flinch (Roll 1 dice)

Item.Name: Rocky Helmet
Item.Description: Deal 1 damage roll against a foe who has hit you with a non-ranged physical move.

Item.Name: Wide Lens
Item.Description: Increase accuracy by 1.

Item.Name: Shock Drive
Item.Description: Changes Techno blast to Electric.

Item.Name: Burn Drive
Item.Description: Changes Techno blast to Fire.

Item.Name: Chill Drive
Item.Description: Changes Techno blast to Ice.

Item.Name: Douse Drive
Item.Description: Changes Techno blast to Water.

Item.Name: Absorb Bulb
Item.Description: Boosts the Special by 1 of the user when hit with a Water type move. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Air Balloon
Item.Description: The user is immune to Ground type moves. This item bursts once the user is hit.

Item.Name: Assault Vest
Item.Description: Increases Special Defense by 2. But the user cannot use Support moves.

Item.Name: Big Root
Item.Description: When using absorbing hp, roll 3 chance dice to heal 1 additional hp.

Item.Name: Binding Band
Item.Description: Binding moves now have double the damage pool.

Item.Name: Black Sludge
Item.Description: Poison type Pokemon may heal 1 hp as a bonus action. This can be done 10 times before depleting. Non-poison types take 1 damage per turn from holding this.

Item.Name: Blue Scarf
Item.Description: Increases Beauty by 1 during contests.

Item.Name: Blunder Policy
Item.Description: Raises Dexterity by 2 when the Pokemon misses.

Item.Name: Bright Powder
Item.Description: Removes 1 die from the opponent's accuracy pool.

Item.Name: Cell Battery
Item.Description: Boosts the Strength by 1 of the user when hit with a Electric type move. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Choice Band
Item.Description: Increases the Strength by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Item.Name: Choice Scarf
Item.Description: Increases the Dexterity by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Item.Name: Choice Specs
Item.Description: Increases the Special by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Item.Name: Cleanse Tag
Item.Description: Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters.

Item.Name: Damp Rock
Item.Description: Rain Dance now sets Rainy Weather for 7 turns.

Item.Name: Dark Rock
Item.Description: New Moon now sets New Moon for 7 turns.

Item.Name: Destiny Knot
Item.Description: When the Pokemon is infatuated, the opponent also becomes infatuated.

Item.Name: Eject Button
Item.Description: When the Pokemon is hit with a damaging move, it switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Item.Name: Eject Pack
Item.Description: When the Pokemon's stats are reduced, it switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Item.Name: Electric Seed
Item.Description: Increases Defense by 1 in Electric Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Item.Name: Flame Orb
Item.Description: Inflicts the user with Burn 1 when held.

Item.Name: Float Stone
Item.Description: The Pokemon's weight is halved.

Item.Name: Focus Band
Item.Description: If an attack were to reduce the user's hp to 0 by a damaging move. Roll 1 chance dice to survive at 1 hp.

Item.Name: Focus Sash
Item.Description: If this Pokemon were to faint from a damaging move, reduce its hp to 1 instead. The item breaks upon use.

Item.Name: Grassy Seed
Item.Description: Increases Defense by 1 in Grassy Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Item.Name: Green Scarf
Item.Description: Increases Clever by 1 during contests.

Item.Name: Grip Claw
Item.Description: Binding moves now lasts an additional 2 rounds.

Item.Name: Heat Rock
Item.Description: Sunny Day now sets Sunny Weather for 7 turns.

Item.Name: Heavy Duty Boots
Item.Description: The user is now immune to entry hazards.

Item.Name: Icy Rock
Item.Description: Hail now sets Hail Weather for 7 turns.

Item.Name: Iron Ball
Item.Description: Reduces the holder's Dexterity by 2 and makes them subsceptable to Ground type moves.

Item.Name: Lagging Tail
Item.Description: This holder always goes last in the the initiative order.

Item.Name: Leftovers
Item.Description: The holder may heal 1 hp as a bonus action. This can be done 10 times before depleting.

Item.Name: Light Clay
Item.Description: Light Screen and Reflect now lasts 7 rounds.

Item.Name: Luminous Moss
Item.Description: Boosts the Special Defense by 1 of the user when hit with a Water type move. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Mental Herb
Item.Description: If the user is Infatuated or affected by Taunt, Torment, Encore, or Disable, then they are cured but the item gets consumed.

Item.Name: Metronome
Item.Description: Increases the damage pool of moves by 1 when used consecutively up to 3 times.

Item.Name: Misty Seed
Item.Description: Increases Special Defense by 1 in Misty Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Item.Name: Muscle Band
Item.Description: Boosts the power of all Physical moves by 1.

Item.Name: Pink Scarf
Item.Description: Increases Cute by 1 during contests.

Item.Name: Power Herb
Item.Description: Allows the user to use Charge moves immediately. It is consumed upon use.

Item.Name: Protective Pad
Item.Description: The user is immune to contact effects.

Item.Name: Psychic Seed
Item.Description: Increases Special Defense by 1 in Psychic Terrain Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Item.Name: Red Card
Item.Description: When the Pokemon is hit with a damaging move, the attacker switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Item.Name: Red Scarf
Item.Description: Increases Cool by 1 during contests.

Item.Name: Ring Target
Item.Description: The user loses their type immunity to moves.

Item.Name: Room Service
Item.Description: Reduces the user's Initiative by 2 during Trick Room.

Item.Name: Safety Goggles
Item.Description: The user is immune to Weather related damage as well as Powder moves.

Item.Name: Scope Lens
Item.Description: All moves are now High Critical.

Item.Name: Shed Shell
Item.Description: The user is immune to effects that would prevent them from switching out.

Item.Name: Shell Bell
Item.Description: Restores 1 hp everytime the user inflicts damage.

Item.Name: Smoke Bomb
Item.Description: The user can escape from any Wild Encounter.

Item.Name: Smooth Rock
Item.Description: Sandstorm now sets Sandstorm Weather for 7 rounds.

Item.Name: Snowball
Item.Description: Boosts the Strength by 1 of the user when hit with a Ice type move. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Sticky Barb
Item.Description: Damages the user for 3 hp per round. If hit by a foe with no held items, it will transfer onto them.

Item.Name: Terrain Extender
Item.Description: Terrain moves now lasts for an additional 3 rounds.

Item.Name: Throat Spray
Item.Description: Increases Special by 1 when the user uses a Sound based move for the first time.

Item.Name: Utility Umbrella
Item.Description: The user is immune to the effects of weather.

Item.Name: Weakness Policy
Item.Description: When hit by a move the Pokemon is weak to, increase Strength and Special by 2.

Item.Name: White Herbs
Item.Description: The user may restore all lowered stats in battle as a bonus action. It is consumed upon use.

Item.Name: Wise Glasses
Item.Description: Boosts the power of all Special moves by 1.

Item.Name: Yellow Scarf
Item.Description: Increases Tough by 1 during contests.

Item.Name: Zoom Lens
Item.Description: Increases accuracy by 2 if the user is lower than the target on the initiative order.

Item.Name: Cheri Berry
Item.Description: Eating this Berry will cure Paralysis.

Item.Description: Eating this Berry will cure Sleep.

Item.Description: Eating this Berry will cure Burn 1 and Burn 2.

Item.Description: Eating this Berry will cure Confusion.

Item.Name: Lum Berry
Item.Description: Eating this Berry will cure all Status ailments.

Item.Name: Sitrus Berry
Item.Description: Eating this Berry will heal 3 HP or 1 Lethal Damage.

Item.Name: Babiri Cherry
Item.Description: Decreases damage from Super Effective Steel-type attacks by 3. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Roseli Berry

Item.Name: Chilan Berry

Item.Name: Jaboca Berry
Item.Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Physical Attack, Roll 2 Die of damage against the attacker. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Rowap Berry
Item.Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Special Attack, Roll 2 Die of damage against the attacker. Consumed on use.

Item.Name: Big Camping Tent
Item.Description: A spacious tent for your group to stay a cozy night. Sprayed with Wild Pokemon repellent substances.

Item.Name: Small Camping Tent
Item.Description: A comfortable space for 1 person, or 2 if you don't mind squeezing.

Item.Name: Sleeping Bag
Item.Description: Not too comfortable. You'll be able to sleep warm and dry but after a few nights your back may hurt.

Item.Name: Camping Stove & Cookware
Item.Description: Forget about hunting and eating roots like a savage. With this luxury set you'll always have a warm meal.

Item.Name: Canned Meal
Item.Description: It's nothing fancy but there's no need to travel on an empty stomach. One can is enough for one day

Item.Name: Regional Map
Item.Description: A map with the marked routes, cities and Pokemon Centers of the region you are in.

Item.Name: Compass
Item.Description: A useful compass to point you in the right direction. Warning: Keep away from magnets.

Item.Name: Pokedex
Item.Description: A digital encyclopedia with basic information about regional Pokemon. You may add your own research.

Item.Name: Pokedex Upgrade
Item.Description: Upgrade your Pokedex with the information of the Pokemon on a new region.

Item.Name: Mountain Bike
Item.Description: You will travel twice as fast with this awesome all-terrain bike. Now at an insane price!

Item.Name: Inflatable Boat
Item.Description: A small boat for a single person. Your pokemon may pull you through the water or you can use the rows

Item.Name: Fishing Rod
Item.Description: A fishing rod to catch pokemon living underwater. Somedays they just won't bite, though.

Item.Name: Saddle
Item.Description: Strap this on and you'll never worry about falling from your pokemon again.

Item.Name: Sled
Item.Description: Your pokemon can pull you around through snow, sand, or any smooth surface. It's super fun!

Item.Name: Pokedolls
Item.Description: Life-size decoy used to escape wild pokemon. Some people like to collect them.

Item.Name: Repel
Item.Description: Most pokemon won't come neaer to you for a whole day. The smell is now machine washable.

Item.Name: Pepper Spray Can
Item.Description: Scares away small pokemon, but it may enrage the bigger ones. Good for 5 uses.

Item.Name: Potion
Item.Description: A pocket sized spray potion to relieve the pain and heal bruises

Item.Name: Super Potion
Item.Description: A regular can of concentrated formula spray. This potion can close open wounds and even heal a cracked bone.

Item.Name: Hyper Potion
Item.Description: Best value pack. It can be rationed for smaller injuries on the team, or used all at once on a serious wound.

Item.Name: Max Potion
Item.Description: A single-use capsule of formula. The pokemon won't be able to restore health further until the next day.

Item.Name: Full Restore
Item.Description: A single-use capsule of deluxe formula. The pokemon won't be able to restore health until the next day.

Item.Name: Antidote
Item.Description: A shot that quickly reduces the fever and relieves the pain.

Item.Name: Awakening
Item.Description: Sprays a water-based solution to awake a drowsy pokemon.

Item.Name: Burn Heal
Item.Description: A powder that douses the fire and aids in the healing of the burnt area.

Item.Name: Ice Heal
Item.Description: Recovers the normal termperature of the pokemon and heals frost bite.

Item.Name: Paralyze Heal
Item.Description: This ointment relaxes the muscles and stops the cramping

Item.Name: Full Heal
Item.Description: A superior spray formula that can heal any status problem in a second.

Item.Name: Energy Root
Item.Description: A nasty tasting root with mystical properties that can be eaten whole or turned into up to 4 batches of powder if you know how to do it.

Item.Name: Energy Powder
Item.Description: This powder leaves a horrid aftertaste, but at least it stops the pain

Item.Name: Heal Powder
Item.Description: A mix of the most foul looking herbs you can find can make this cure-all powder

Item.Name: Revival Herb
Item.Description: It may be its magical properties or just its awful flavor, but this herb will get you back into consciousness numbing all the pain away. ***Extremely rare to find.***

Item.Name: Revive
Item.Description: A small energy shard that brings a fainted Human or pokemon back into conciousness and stabilizes their wounds.

Item.Name: Max Revive
Item.Description: A bigger shard that is not available to the public

Item.Name: Berry Juice
Item.Description: This mixed drink of various berries is also quite refreshing. Some pokemon produce it naturally.

Item.Name: Fresh Water
Item.Description: Full of electrolytes and just the right amount of sodium, restores the vitality of those who are tired.

Item.Name: Sodapop
Item.Description: This sugary drink grives you a quick shot of energy after being quite tired.

Item.Name: Lemonade
Item.Description: The citric boost and added vitamins make this a favorite after exercise.

Item.Name: Moomoo Milk
Item.Description: Found in organic farms, this milk is full of calcium and is right out of the Miltank

Item.Name: Pokeball
Item.Description: A basic ball for catching pokemon and carrying heavy items.

Item.Name: Greatball
Item.Description: A sturdier barrier protects the seal allowing easier catch.

Item.Name: Ultraball
Item.Description: The best seal in the market to ensure the catch of stronger pokemon.

Item.Name: Masterball
Item.Description: It is said to be in development by some companies in the world, and rumored to have a seal so strong it would never break.

Item.Name: Pokemon Dry Food Pack
Item.Description: A bag with dry kibble.

Item.Name: Gourmet Food Can
Item.Description: Made with Premium ingredients. All pokemon will love you if you feed them this on a regular basis.

Item.Name: High Performance Food Sack
Item.Description: A high-protein kibble made for athletics. *Add 1 dice to the next Training Roll of the pokemon.*

Item.Name: Protein
Item.Description: A tasty milkshake that aids in the growth of bigger and stronger muscles.

Item.Name: Iron
Item.Description: An iron capsule that reduces feebleness and gives you a healthy glow.

Item.Name: Calcium
Item.Description: Add this effervescent pill to their drink to help grow stronger bones.

Item.Name: Zinc
Item.Description: Zinc capsules help with focus and brain development

Item.Name: Carbos
Item.Description: A healthy syrup that fills you with energy!

Item.Name: Pp Up
Item.Description: It is rumered they are just sugar pills. Who really knows?

Item.Name: Hp Up
Item.Description: A compendium of vitamins and minerals to help your pokemono grow as big and healthy as it can be.

Item.Name: Rare Candy
Item.Description: This strange candy is made of unknown ingredients. Its effects do not stack.

Item.Name: Grooming Kit
Item.Description: No more matted hair, unruly leaves, dry scales, or rough rocks!

Item.Name: Pokemon Costume
Item.Description: Fashionable clothes. Your companions will look amazing in these costumes and they will love it.

Item.Name: Piece of Accessory
Item.Description: Ribbons, hats, collars, and everything you need to make them look super special.

Item.Name: Fire Stone
Item.Description: This Stone has a flame inside, it's hot to the touch.

Item.Name: Thunder Stone
Item.Description: It glows in the dark and can be used to power small electronics.

Item.Name: Water Stone
Item.Description: Looks like blue glass and can be found at the bottom of the sea.

Item.Name: Leaf Stone
Item.Description: It is said that the leaf encrusted to it comes from the tree of life itself

Item.Name: Moon Stone
Item.Description: It is a black stone that turns white and luminescent when the moon shines over it.

Item.Name: Sun Stone
Item.Description: A red stone that shines brightly when facing the sun in the morning.

Item.Name: Shiny Stone
Item.Description: Its crystal-like surface aloows you to see a ball of light inside.

Item.Name: Dusk Stone
Item.Description: This stone seems to suck the light around into a small dark hole.

Item.Name: Dawn Stone
Item.Description: This cerulean stone shines with blinding light for a minute during sunrise.

Item.Description: Makes Venusaur Mega-evolve into Mega-Venusaur

Item.Description: Makes Steelix Mega-evolve into Mega-Steelix

Item.Description: Makes Swampert Mega-evolve into Mega-Swampert

Item.Description: Makes Glalie Mega-evolve into Mega-Glalie

Item.Name: Metagrossite
Item.Description: Makes Metagross Mega-evolve into Mega-Metagross

Item.Name: Lopunnite

Item.Name: Diancite
Item.Description: Makes Diancie Mega-evolve into Mega-Diancie

Item.Name: Blast Seed
Item.Description: If you eat this seed you'll suddenly sneeze a blast of fire. Foes do not have time to react. Deal 1 damage to a foe.

Item.Name: Sleep Seed
Item.Description: Make a Dexterity + Fight + Canalize roll to shoot these seeds into your foe's mouth. Inflict the Sleep Condition.

Item.Name: Stun Seed
Item.Description: Make  a  Dexterity  +  Fight  +  Canalize roll to shoot these seeds into your foe's mouth. Inflict the Paralysis Condition.

Item.Name: Encourage Seed
Item.Description: It doesn't taste any different than a plain seed, but you'll feel a surge of confidence after eating it. Gain High Critical in all moves for a scene.

Item.Name: Heal Seed
Item.Description: This seed's pure energy will cleanse any impurities away from your body, leaving you glowing with health. Heal all Status Conditions.

Item.Name: Reviver Seed
Item.Description: Feed this seed to a Pokemon that just lost conciousness to get it back on its feet. These seeds are incredibly rare. Restore 1HP and return awareness.

Item.Name: All-Hit Orb
Item.Description: As it explodes, the visibility around gets clear, no light, darkness or fog impedes your team to strike direcly. Gain Never-Miss in all moves for a scene.

Item.Name: Escape Orb
Item.Description: This orb allows you to escape back to the guild. (The Mission will fail if the objective was not completed). Escape back to Guild territory.

Item.Name: Health Orb
Item.Description: Those who stand inside the blast's ratio will become healthy again, try to keep it thay way. Heal all Status Conditions.

Item.Name: Luminous Orb
Item.Description: As it explodes, the Orb will reveal the paths in the dungeon. Traps, treasures, hostile Pok'mon, etc. remain hidden. Reveal the dungeon.

Item.Name: Weather Orb
Item.Description: This orb will call for Sunshine, Rain, a Sandstorm or Hail in the area. The effects will last for the Scene. Summon a Weather condition.

Item.Name: Observer Orb
Item.Description: Those affected by the orb's blast will remain observing the lights it produced unable to move. Flinch all foes in range.

Item.Name: All-Protect Orb
Item.Description: For the next three attacks each member of  the  team  receives, an energy field will protect you from damage. Cast Protect three times on each teammate.
